original: A struggle has erupted for political control of China. We must secure support from warlords and the population in various states to emerge victorious.
translation: 一场关于中国的政权控制的斗争爆发了。我们必须获取各军阀和各省人民的支持才能胜利。

original: Chinese politics can be as vicious as any war. Should we or anyone else decide to make a play for National Leadership, we must be ready to secure support from warlords and the population in various states to emerge victorious.
translation: 中国政治可以像任何战争一样凶险。如果我们或者其它任何人希望获取国家的领导权，那就必须做好争取军阀和各省人民的支持以获得胜利的准备。

original: Liberating states during war will give you §HState Majority§!\n
translation: 战争期间被你解放的地区将会给予你§H地区主导权§!\n

original: Has at least §G30§! §HPolitical Support Points§!. We currently have [?Root.total_political_support_points|+0].
translation: 有至少§G30§! §H政治支持点§!。我们现在有[?Root.total_political_support_points|+0]。

original: Has at least §G17§! §HPolitical Support Points§!. We currently have [?Root.total_political_support_points|+0].
translation: 有至少§G17§! §H政治支持点§!。 我们现在有[?Root.total_political_support_points|+0]。

original: Is not current leader of China

Has more §HPolitical Support Points§! than [WTT_current_china_leader.GetNameDef]([?WTT_current_china_leader.total_political_support_points|0H]). We currently have [?Root.total_political_support_points|+0].
translation: 比[WTT_current_china_leader.GetNameDef]([?WTT_current_china_leader.total_political_support_points|0H])拥有更多§H政治支持点§!。我们现在拥有 [?Root.total_political_support_points|+0]。

original: Starts a Political Power Struggle with [WTT_current_china_leader.GetNameDef] for National Leadership\n
Join all wars that §H[WTT_current_china_leader.GetNameDef]§! is fighting.\n

§H[This.GetStateMajorityCountryName]§! has §HState Majority§! and receives [?This.state_political_support_value|+0] §HPolitical Support Points§! until a different country gains higher §HLocal Support§!\n\n
translation: §H[This.GetStateMajorityCountryName]§!获得§H地区主导权§!，并且在一个不同的国家有更高的§H本地支持率§!之前获得[?This.state_political_support_value|+0]§H政治支持点§!\n\n

original: No war for national leadership is ongoing.\nThe Power Struggle will be reset when the war is concluded.
translation: 目前没有正在进行的对于争夺国家领导权的战争。\n权力斗争将在战争结束时重置。

original: Power Struggle for National Leadership is still ongoing.
translation: 国家领导权的斗争仍在继续。

original:
A §H[Root.GetPrinceOfTerrorLoc]§! will remove §H2§! more §HLocal Support§!
A §H[Root.GetBackRoomBackstabberLoc]§! will remove §H1§! more §HLocal Support§!
translation:
一个§H[Root.GetPrinceOfTerrorLoc]§!会移除§H2§!§H本地支持率§!
A §H[Root.GetBackRoomBackstabberLoc]§! will remove §H1§! more §HLocal Support§!

original: The cost of getting [From.GetNameDef] to support us scales based on ideology and their opinion of us.\n
translation: 从[From.GetNameDef]获取支持的代价会根据他们的意识形态和我们之间的双边关系而变化。\n

original: Negotiating for support from [From.GetLeader] again will become more expensive.\n
translation: 再次与[From.GetLeader]谈判以获得支持的代价会变得更加高昂。\n
[From.GetNameDef]希望获得协议中的装备和兵员

original: Has not chosen a country to support.
translation: 没有选择任何要支持的国家。

original: Has not chosen to support another Chinese nation in the political struggle.
translation: 没有在政治斗争中选择支持其它任何一个中国军阀

original: Is not negotiating support with another faction.\n
translation: 没有与任何其它派系谈判以获得支持。\n

original: @CHI§HNationalist China§! is no longer the leader of China
The chance of [From.GetNameDef] supporting us scales with their opinion of us. Having the same ideology further increases the chance.\n
translation: [From.GetNameDef]会支持我们的可能性会随着我们的双边关系变化而变化。拥有相同的意识形态则会增加这一可能性。\n

original: Local party functionaries in [state.GetName] report that a majority of citizens in the region still support us. Extensive work has even lead to an increase in support in the area.
translation: [state.GetName]本地派系的职能部门报告，当地多数的人民还在继续支持我们。大规模的工作甚至增加了我们的支持率。

original: People know a winner when they see one.

Sources in [state.GetName] report that [majority_country.GetNameDef] appears to have made a concerted push to increase support all throughout the region. A clear majority of the population still supports them.
translation: 来自[state.GetName]的消息称[majority_country.GetNameDef]似乎 在竭尽全力地增加其在当地的影响力。绝大多数人们还在继续支持他们

original: Encouraging news have arrived from [state.GetName], where a "[Root.GetLeader] Thought Study Society" was formed a while ago. This group now commands a large amount of support from the population. Any mention of their previous support for [old_majority_country.GetLeader] has disappeared.
translation: 从[state.GetName]传来了令人振奋的消息，最近，一个"[Root.GetLeader]思想研究会"被建立了起来。这个组织现在拥有极大的群众基础。任何提及他们之前支持的[old_majority_country.GetLeader]的思想都已经消失。
它们遵循着一个更好的理论

original: Our agents in [state.GetName] report that support for [old_majority_country.GetNameDef] in the area has fallen off significantly. More recently, large demonstrations in support of [majority_country.GetNameDef] have marched through the major cities in the state, and large pictures of [majority_country.GetLeader] can be found in every village.
translation: 我们派往[state.GetName]的间谍回报当地支持[old_majority_country.GetNameDef]的人已寥寥无几.尤其在最近，支持[majority_country.GetNameDef]的游行在各地爆发，[majority_country.GetLeader]画像遍布乡下。

original: Using every means at their disposal, agents of [majority_country.GetNameDef] seem to have succeeded in swaying the population of [state.GetName] to their side. We must redouble our efforts to win their trust.
translation: [majority_country.GetNameDef]的特工尽其所能，已经引导[state.GetName]当地人民支持他们.我们得加把劲扭转势头。

original: Despite a major effort to convince the inhabitants of [state.GetName], few seem to be willing to switch sides openly. Rumor has it that [majority_country.GetLeader] himself has declared that [state.GetName] must be held at all costs. Many citizens fear reprisals should they openly show their support for [Root.GetLeader], but our local representatives are hopeful that a renewed effort in the future might be able to convince more people.
translation: 尽管我方大费周章，[state.GetName]的人们却鲜少愿意支持我们.传言说[majority_country.GetLeader]下了死命令要维护在[state.GetName]的主导权.当地人担心公开支持[Root.GetLeader]会招来打击报复，但我方当地负责人认为进一步的努力会赢得当地人的支持。

original: Support For [From.GetNameDef] On the Rise in [state.GetName]

Newspapers in [state.GetName] report record crowds at a series of recent speeches by [From.GetLeader]. It appears that a growing part of the population is now supporting [From.GetNameDef]. For the moment, however, a majority still supports [majority_country.GetLeader].
translation: [state.GetName]当地报纸报道称[From.GetLeader]演说聚集了史无前例的人群。[From.GetNameDef]似乎赢得了越来越多人的支持.然而[majority_country.GetLeader]仍然在当地占据主导。

original: Disturbing news have arrived from [state.GetName]. A series of speeches by [From.GetLeader] has drawn large crowds, and our local party functionaries have found themselves surrounded by angry citizens demanding answers to the questions facing [state.GetName]. For the moment, our position in the state is still secure, but that may change quickly.
translation: [state.GetName]传来坏消息。[From.GetLeader]发表的一些演说聚集了大量人群.我们在当地的机构身陷囫囵，被市民逼问有关[state.GetName]的事宜.我们在当地的根基尚且牢固，但状况随时可变。

original: We will have to keep an eye on the situation.

A demonstration in [state.GetName] has escalated into violence as protesters were attacked by a group of masked thugs. this explosion of violence seems to have had the desired effect, as the political support for the opposition has all but disappeared. \n\nWhile there is nothing directly connecting us to this incident, the message should have come through loud and clear.
translation: 在[state.GetName]的一场游行发展成了游行参与者与一群蒙面歹徒的械斗.这场暴力事件似乎起到了打击对方声望的效果。\n\n我们虽然没有直接参与其中，但相比大家心知肚明。

original: That should teach them not to meddle.
translation: 这算是给他们一个教训。

original: A demonstration in support of our government in [state.GetName] has been attacked by armed thugs in the employ of [majority_country.GetLeader]. A number of our supporters have been killed in the clash, and support for our government has dropped precariously.
translation: 在[state.GetName]，一场支持我们的游行被[majority_country.GetLeader]狗腿子袭击了.结果死了不少人，我们的名望也不保。

original: Our agents in [state.GetName] have executed a series of attacks on local party headquarters of [old_majority_country.GetLeader], severely damaging the political organisation of his party. This has not gone unnoticed by the population. Supporters of [old_majority_country.GetLeader] are now a distinct minority.
translation: Our agents in 我们派往[state.GetName]的特工发动了针对当地[old_majority_country.GetLeader]党派驻地的一系列突袭.人民的眼睛是雪亮的，[old_majority_country.GetLeader]已找人唾弃。

original: All is fair in love and war, and politics are a bit of both.
translation: 政治就是爱恨交织，无所顾忌。

original: Support for [old_majority_country.GetLeader] in [state.GetName] has dropped significantly after a series of firebombings of party offices. These attacks were probably ordered by [majority_country.GetLeader], who has promised to "restore order" in [state.GetName]. It appears that a majority of the population now put their support behind him.
translation: 在一系列针对党派公所的袭击后，[old_majority_country.GetLeader]在[state.GetName]已不受待见。[majority_country.GetLeader]多半指示了这些袭击并且保证会在[state.GetName]恢复秩序.当地大部分民众转而支持他。

original: Following a series of terrorist attacks in [state.GetName], the local population seems to have lost faith in our ability to protect them. Since the attacks exclusively targeted our party offices, it is clear that [majority_country.GetLeader] had a hand in this.
translation: 在一系列恐怖袭击后，[state.GetName]的当地人已不再信任我们的保护.这些袭击专门挑我们的办事处，说明[majority_country.GetLeader]肯定插了一脚。

original: Our campaign to suppress support for [majority_country.GetLeader] seems to have fallen well short of a complete success. Despite our best efforts, a majority of citizens in [state.GetName] still support [majority_country.GetLeader].
translation: 我们镇压[majority_country.GetLeader]支持者的工作不了了之。[state.GetName]当地人仍然支持[majority_country.GetLeader]。

original: We may need to hammer the message home.

[state.GetName] is experiencing an unprecedented wave of political violence. Street battles between supporters of [From.GetLeader] and [majority_country.GetLeader] are a daily occurence. For the moment, it appears that [majority_country.GetLeader] still has the majority of the population behind him.
translation: [state.GetName]正在经历一波政治动荡。[From.GetLeader]与[majority_country.GetLeader]的支持者日日在街上械斗.目前来看，[majority_country.GetLeader]仍然受大部分当地人的支持。

original: Agents of [From.GetLeader] in [state.GetName] have started a campaign of intimidation and political terror. Reports have come in that citizens who support us are publically harrassed and branded as traitors. Party officials have been beaten up and some of our offices have been burned down. Despite all this, a majority of the local population still refuses to bow to terror and continues to support us.
translation: [From.GetLeader]在[state.GetName]的特工煽动起了政治恐怖运动.报道称当地支持我们的民众被当街骚扰并被批为叛徒.党派地方领袖被暴打，办事处被纵火.尽管如此，大部分命中还是站在我们这边。

original: A representative of [asking_for_support.GetLeader] has arrived to sound us out for a political alliance. [asking_for_support.GetLeader] promises not to interfere in our internal matters should he prevail in the current political struggle. Taking sides in this conflict might have long term repercussions, as other parties involved would no doubt consider it a betrayal.
translation: [asking_for_support.GetLeader]的一位代表前来谋求政治同盟。[asking_for_support.GetLeader]答应在赢得斗争后不插手我们的内部事务.参与其中将会有深远影响，就算声援也会被视为背叛。

original: We should wait for a better deal.

In a personal letter to [Root.GetLeader], [warlord_asked_for_support.GetLeader] thanks us for our generous support of his administration. The letter continues to say that after much personal deliberation, [warlord_asked_for_support.GetLeader] has come to the conclusion that the interests of China as a whole are best served by giving [Root.GetLeader] a bigger role in shaping its political future.\n\nFrom now on, the letter ends, [warlord_asked_for_support] will support our efforts in the current political struggle.
translation: [warlord_asked_for_support.GetLeader]在一封写给[Root.GetLeader]的私信中对我们慷慨支援他的政权表示感谢.此信进一步表明在深思熟虑后，[warlord_asked_for_support.GetLeader]认为中国的未来仰赖于[Root.GetLeader]发挥更广泛的政治作用。\n\n信中结尾说道，从此以往，[warlord_asked_for_support]会支持我们的政治事业。

original: Our mission to secure the support of [warlord_asked_for_support.GetLeader] has not been met with success. [warlord_asked_for_support.GetLeader] considers to the current political struggle to be a mere sideshow distracting us from focusing on the real threats facing China.
translation: 派往[warlord_asked_for_support.GetLeader]的代表团失败了。[warlord_asked_for_support.GetLeader]认为当下的政权斗争不过是扰乱我们面对中国真正敌人的闹剧。

original: As long as he remains neutral...

We have so far elected to sit out the current political struggle. It appears that this has not gone unnoticed by [From.GetLeader]. He has send a note, asking what it would take for us to declare our support for his side.\n\nWe should weigh our options carefully and ensure we do not sell our independence too cheaply.
translation: 现今为止，我们都一直参与这场政权斗争。[From.GetLeader]似乎对此有些察觉.他送来口信，询问怎样才能获得我们的支持。\n\n我们应该仔细斟酌，不能贱卖了自主权。

original: Ask for a show of public support.
Ask for a delivery of rifles.
Ask for help in reforming our military.
We will not be bought so easily!
[From.GetLeader] demands a public show of support.

Negotiations with [From.GetLeader] have concluded. The leader of [From.GetNameDef] has noted that the population in his state follows the events around China with great interest and speculation is rife about when [From.GetLeader] will join the struggle for control or give up his seat at the table. \n\nA public declaration of friendship and admiration for [From.GetLeader] from our side would go a long way to assure the people of [From.GetNameDef] that their leader is considered an important force in Chinese politics and widely respected.
translation: 与[From.GetLeader]的谈判已经结束。[From.GetNameDef]的领导人他治下民众密切关注整个中国事态的发展，而关于[From.GetLeader]是否插手或者退出的传言也遍布四方。\n\n一场与[From.GetLeader]的亲善公告必将保证[From.GetNameDef]的民众把他们的领袖当作中国政治中的重要人物。

original: If this is what it takes...

Negotiations with [From.GetLeader] have concluded. The leader of [From.GetNameDef] has noted that the population in his state are very concerned about the poor equipment of his soldiers. Many units do not even have a rifle for every man, and a number of soldiers have to use outdated weaponry including old muzzle-loaded muskets and swords. \n\nSince choosing sides in the ongoing conflict might lead to a military confrontation down the line, [From.GetLeader] wanted a firm commitment on our part to reequip his forces with weapons before he will make his support publically known.
translation: 与[From.GetLeader]的谈判已经闭幕。[From.GetNameDef]的领导人指出其治下区内民众对各士兵的粗劣装备深感不安。各单位甚至无法做到一人一杆枪，而也有一定数量的战士只得使用落伍的枪口装填式火枪和刀剑这类老旧武器。\n\n自从在这场旷日许久的斗争中选定支持派系后，事态可能恶化为武力冲突，[From.GetLeader]希望能就重新武装其军力以便公开发表立场一事获得我方的切实承诺。

original: Let's hope we don't end up regretting this...
translation: 但愿我等不会为此后悔……

original: Negotiations with [From.GetLeader] have concluded. In his reply, [From.GetLeader] noted that his military forces is desperately lacking in experienced officers and is in dire need of reform. The people of [From.GetNameDef] would never tolerate him taking such a bold stance in the current struggle while his army was in such shambles. \n\nIf we were to help [From.GetLeader] in reforming his army, he would be happy to publically support us.
translation: 与[From.GetLeader]的谈判已经闭幕。在[From.GetLeader]的回文中，他指出其军事力量极度缺乏经验丰富的士官并急需重组改编。而[From.GetNameDef]的民众则绝不会容忍他在现今斗争中军力残缺的情况下如此贸然行事。\n\n如果我们协助[From.GetLeader]改组其军队，他应该会愿意公开支持我们。

original: Speaking to the assembled national and international press earlier this week, [From.GetLeader] called himself "the first student of [From.From.GetLeader] thought", saying that it is men like [From.From.GetLeader] that will allow China to rise from the chaos of internal strife and conflict.\n\nWhen asked whether he would consider [From.From.GetLeader] for a position in his government, [From.GetLeader] replied that he would be happy to have someone with [From.From.GetLeader]'s experience and wisdom by his side.
translation: 在本周召集国内外记者的会谈上，[From.GetLeader]自称为"[From.From.GetLeader]思想之头号门徒"，声称只有如[From.From.GetLeader]之辈方能让中国从内斗与冲突的混乱中崛起。\n\n当被提及他是否会考虑让[From.From.GetLeader]在政府中就职时，[From.GetLeader]表示很乐意让[From.From.GetLeader]这样经验丰富且明智之人居于身旁。

original: The first shipment of rifles and other infantry equipment has arrived from [From.GetNameDef]. Although these weapons are hardly cutting edge technology, they seem to be in good working order and can be issued to the troops as soon as possible.\n\nTogether with the shipment, we received a note from [From.GetLeader], reminding us to hold up our end of the deal.
translation: [From.GetNameDef]运出的第一批步枪与其他步兵装备已经送达。尽管这些武器不能说是前沿科技成果，但似乎在应用方面并无缺陷，并能立刻分发给各部军士。\n\n伴随货运一同到来的还有[From.GetLeader]的一则电文，提醒我们不得遗忘己方约定的义务。

original: A group of officers has arrived, sent by [From.GetLeader] with the mission to help us in reforming our military. The group covers a wide variety of specialists, from experienced infantry commanders to artillery men and staff officers. \n\nThe leader of the outfit handed over a note from [From.GetLeader], reminding us to hold up our end of the bargain.
translation: [From.GetLeader]派出协助我军改组整编的军官团已经抵达。使团内成员包含各类精英专家，自久经沙场的步兵指挥与炮兵士官到参谋职员各有特长》\n\n使团领队提交了一份[From.GetLeader]撰写的电文，提醒我们不得遗忘己方约定的义务。

original: All across China, large demonstrations have taken place, demanding that [old_leader.GetLeader] setp down as leader of China and hand over control to [new_leader.GetLeader]. Even within our government, there are many who believe that [new_leader.GetLeader] has better chances to unite China and lead it into the future. \n\nPolitical support for [new_leader.GetLeader] has grown to the point where refusing the transfer of power would risk a return to hostilities.
translation: 举国上下各是大规模游行占据街道，要求[old_leader.GetLeader]下台并将权力交与[new_leader.GetLeader]。甚至在政府内部，同样有不少职员认为[new_leader.GetLeader]作为领导人更能统一中国并带领人民走向未来。\n\n[new_leader.GetLeader]所获政治支持已经到了足以因拒绝一言而引来人民怒火的地步。

original: The people have made their will known.

In an official ceremony, [old_leader.GetLeader] has transferred the premiership of the Republic to [new_leader.GetLeader]. Holding a speech before his gathered supporters, [new_leader.GetLeader] said this: 

"The traditions of [old_leader.GetLeader] Thought have made China what it is today. There can be no doubt that [old_leader.GetLeader] has worked hard to make our country stronger. He is a true patriot and will be remembered as a great leader. But we must also give new ideas a chance to prove themselves in the real world. Together, we will create a new, a better China, strong and united!"

[old_leader.GetLeader] did not comment.
translation:
在一场官方典礼上，[old_leader.GetLeader]将国民政府主席职位交与[new_leader.GetLeader]手中。在一众支持者面前，[new_leader.GetLeader]发表了如下演讲：

"[old_leader.GetLeader]思想的传统与经验就让中国现今成为了如此宏伟之国度。无疑[old_leader.GetLeader]已为中华之强盛而鞠躬尽瘁。贵公即是真正的爱国者之表率，而定会作为伟大领袖载入史册。但我等也需令新生之智于此盛世中展露光辉。吾辈将与诸君一同令我中华走上全新、全优、强大而一统的盛世之道！"

[old_leader.GetLeader]并未做出任何评论。

original: Despite overwhelming popular support for [new_leader.GetLeader], [From.GetLeader] has refused to surrender his position as premier of the Republic. Stating that he will never bow to blackmail or surrender the country to traitors and bandits, [From.GetLeader] has made it clear that he will not move from his post.
translation: 尽管[new_leader.GetLeader]有着压倒性的支持，[From.GetLeader]拒绝交出国民政府主席一职、他声称绝不会对此等低劣之胁迫低头或放任叛徒与匪贼夺取国家，[From.GetLeader]已经明确表示不会让出自己的位子。

original: Then we shall take it by force!
translation: 如此则只有武力强取一径！

original: §WAll Chinese countries have access to this decision\n[Root.GetHowToUnlockStruggle]§!
translation: §W所有中国派系都可以选取该决议\n[Root.GetHowToUnlockStruggle]§!

original: Complete §HCoalition Government§! focus to initiate the power struggle.
translation: 完成§H联合政府§!国策以开始权力斗争。

original: Complete §HJoin the Republican Government§! focus to initiate the power struggle.
translation: 完成§H加入国民政府§!国策以开始权力斗争

original: To initiate the power struggle §H[WTT_communist_china.GetNameDef]§! has to complete §HCoalition Government§!.\nThe §HWarlords§! have to complete§H Join the Republican Government§!.
translation: 为开始进行权力斗争，§H[WTT_communist_china.GetNameDef]§!必须完成§H联合政府§!。\n§H军阀派系§!必须完成§H加入国民政府§!。

original:
The political opposition have obtained more §HPolitical Support Points§! than us. They demand national leadership

If we accept:
Our country gets annexed.

If we refuse:
§HDeclare war§! on the political opposition.
translation:
反对派已经获得了比我们更多的§H政治支持点§!。他们要求获得国家领导权

如果我们接受：
我方派系会被吞并。

如果我们拒绝：
对反对派§H宣战§!
